metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15522 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in LINBIT csync2 through 2.0. csync_daemon_session in daemon.c neglects to force a failure of a hello command when the configuration requires use of SSL.

criterions.comment: csync2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
